actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of Transportation to prescribe regulations governing the humane treatment of animals transported in air commerce.

summary.text: Provides that the Secretary of Transportation shall, as soon as practicable after the date of enactment of this Act, prescribe regulations governing the humane treatment of animals transported in air commerce.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Transportation to prescribe regulations governing the humane treatment of animals transported in air commerce.
